test_case = create_checkpoint_test_case(tmpdir)
pipeline, outputs = test_case.pipeline.fit_transform([0, 1], [1, 2])
assert os.path.exists(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline',
    'checkpoint', 'di', '0.pickle'))
assert os.path.exists(os.path.join(tmpdir, 'ResumablePipeline',
    'checkpoint', 'di', '1.pickle'))
